name: energy-root
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Restores 200 HP. Decreases happiness by 10/10/15.

flavor_text.sun-moon: An extremely bitter medicinal root. When consumed, it restores up to 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: An extremely bitter medicinal root. When consumed, it restores up to 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: An extremely bitter medicinal root. When consumed, it restores up to 120 HP to an injured Pokémon.
